name: Mount & Blade

files.setup: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Mount and Blade/mount&blade.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36 d3dx9_27 d3dx9_31
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
